response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the fridge without any errors. Now, the next step is to open the fridge to access the peach inside.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the peach out of the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Open the bottom cabinet
(6) Take a jar out of the bottom cabinet
(7) Close the bottom cabinet
(8) Put the peach inside the jar
(9) Close the jar
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Open the fridge

    open(robot, fridge)
